decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the northern elevation walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The new window formed in the first floor rear extension shall be obscure-glazed and non-opening unless parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7m above the floor of the room in which the window is installed.

Condition : 6 - The outbuilding may only be used for purposes incidental to the use of the existing house at 91 Crane Avenue, TW7 7JR and shall
not be used as a self-contained residence or for any business
purpose.
description: Erection of a first floor rear extension and a single storey outbuilding with associated accessible ramp, steps and landscaping at the rear garden of the house.
